subject: alternative to the 12-470
author: bhali333
full_text:
Hey everyone,

I have been looking all day and have found an alternative to the radio 
shack 12-470 the brand name is SANGEAN model dt-210v I have been on the 
telephone to the technicians at the company and they have faxed me the 
schematic and marked where to cut the connection to make the radio 
sweep.

I have ordered one and when I get it I will try the modification and if 
it works they are readily available for everyone through amazon.com

bruce
